snippet: Major indexes fell about 1 percent as investors expressed disappointment with Friday’s report on the American labor market.
abstract: Stock indexes fall for the fourth consecutive day following a disappointing jobs report.
lead_paragraph: Major indexes fell about 1 percent as investors expressed disappointment with Friday’s report on the American labor market.

headline.seo: Wall Street Stocks Close Lower on Jobs Report
headline.main: Weak Jobs Report Sends Shares Lower for 4th Day
headline.print_headline: Weak Jobs Report Sends Shares Lower for 4th Day
